metadata.synopsis: Players unlock the disc/platform in the Shar temple for the first time.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Insert the gem at the socket at SCL_Main_A (-719; 4; -772)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The disc is moving. This must lead to the next part of Shar's Gauntlet.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if you received knowledge of the Shar trials from the disc altar.NodeContext: [Astarion: 'bloody' as in annoying, not 'lots of blood]

1.speaker: Player
1.text: That disc is moving - might be useful to navigate this place.
